thread.title: Vermont Brewers Festival kicks off today
thread.title_full: Vermont Brewers Festival kicks off today - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Vermont Brewers Festival kicks off today
text:
BURLINGTON, Vt. - One of the most popular events in Vermont starts Friday.
The Vermont Brewers Festival sold out in just minutes earlier this year when tickets went on sale, and that's even with the extra session added for Friday afternoon to try to keep up with demand.
That session starting at noon Friday is open to military family members ages 21+, even if they haven't registered yet.
You can expect a packed scene at the waterfront in Burlington through Saturday night.
